product_description: Sleek and timeless straight-leg jeans are crafted from ultrasoft stretch denim and rendered in a versatile medium-blue wash to make them a true wardrobe MVP.
product_details_and_care:
Sleek and timeless straight-leg jeans are crafted from ultrasoft stretch denim and rendered in a versatile medium-blue wash to make them a true wardrobe MVP.
32" inseam; 13" leg opening; 9" front rise; 13 1/2" back rise (size 29)
Zip fly with button closure
Five-pocket style
72% cotton, 19% Tencel® lyocell, 7% polyester, 2% Lycra® spandex
Machine wash cold, line dry
Imported
t.b.d.
Item #5285298
